mapper.select: select question_title,question_create_date,question_access_num,question_comment_num,qid from bbs_question where uid = (select uid from bbs_user where user_email=#{userEmail})

select q.question_title,q.qid,f.question_favorite_date from bbs_favorite as f LEFT JOIN bbs_question as q on q.uid = f.uid where f.uid = (select uid from bbs_user where user_email = #{userEmail}) group by q.qid

select r.role_chinese_name,r.role_english_name,u.user_reg_date,u.user_email,u.uid,u.user_name,u.user_picture,u.user_auth,u.user_gender,u.user_sign,u.user_gold,u.user_city from bbs_user as u left join bbs_role as r on u.roleid = r.rid where u.user_email = #{userEmail}
